TestCase.name: testAdjustAccordingToFewCPU
TestCase.Resource: select c.c_name, sum(l.l_quantity) from customer c, orders o, lineitem l where o.o_orderkey in ( select l_orderkey from lineitem group by l_orderkey having sum(l_quantity) > 300) and c.c_custkey = o.o_custkey and o.o_orderkey = l.l_orderkey group by c.c_name

HashAggregate(resource=[NodeResource{parallelism=20, cpu=0.3, heapMem=46, directMem=35, reservedManagedMem=32, preferManagedMem=32, maxManagedMem=470}], estimatedTotalMem=[4245948.0], estimatedRowCount=[73206.0], isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c_name], select=[c_name, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(resource=[NodeResource{}], estimatedTotalMem=[0.0], estimatedRowCount=[4392355.826467467], distribution=[hash[c_name]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(resource=[NodeResource{parallelism=261, cpu=0.3, heapMem=46, directMem=35, reservedManagedMem=32, preferManagedMem=32, maxManagedMem=470}], estimatedTotalMem=[2.5475663793511304E8], estimatedRowCount=[4392355.826467467], groupBy=[c_name], select=[c_name, Partial_SUM(l_quantity) AS sum$0]) +-
